document_data.name: Tharzon Brewhammer
document_data.mainbody: '''Tharzon Brewhammer''' was a retired [[dwarf]] adventurer and the owner of the [[Smoke Wyrm]] [[tavern]] in [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. He ran it with his son, [[Kurzen Brewhammer]].
document_data.History: In the early 1370s DR, Tharzon was an acquaintance of [[Jack Ravenwild]] and he was shocked when Jack turned up at his tavern in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, after escaping his one-hundred year imprisonment in the [[mythal]] beneath the city.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|1342|5}} Although he was too old to help Jack with his scheme to recover the [[Sarkonagael]] from [[Sarbreen]], he offered Jack advice and even managed to negotiate a cut of the profits from the venture.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle||7}}
document_data.Description: Tharzon used a cane and had a grey beard and bushy eyebrows.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|1333}}
